contents.title: Software Engineering Intern - Full Stack Development
desc: Created a Ruby on Rails service to ingest nearly 100 MB of data into an Azure database daily.
Developed a GRPC endpoint in Go to assist in validating billions of dollars of monthly transactions.
Implemented automatic test data generation, allowing for improved testing of multiple applications.
Worked in an Agile team which utilized Jira ticket boards, daily standups and pair programming.

contents.title: Undergraduate Learning Assistant - CMPSC 32, CMPSC 24
desc: Ran weekly office hours, and assisted TAs in running weekly labs.
Advised students on programming projects and understanding class concepts.

contents.title: Officer, Programming Specialist, Assistant Social Media Manager
desc: Organized club events and allocated school-provided funds in weekly officer meetings.
Advised club members on game development practices in quarterly projects.
Jointly managed the club Instagram account, creating announcements and promotional materials.
